question: [File: aptos-core/state-sync/data-streaming-service/src/streaming_service.rs] [Function: handle_stream_request_message()] [Type confusion] Can a malicious client send a StreamRequest that is neither TerminateStream nor a valid new stream request, bypassing both processing paths and causing undefined behavior? (High)
